data.actual_result: it cuts the user mentions list short. Settings: Win 7 x64 discord canary
data.expected_result: for it to let you see the entire mention list of users.
data.short_description: when you try to edit a message while already trying to edit a different message it cuts off the mentions list.
data.steps_to_repro: - click on the first message to edit (also im pretty sure it has to be in the middle of all the messages not the most recent message) - then while still in edit for the first message click on a message right above that one to edit - then mention someone.
